Posts.EditableText: I'm currently making a text adventure game using Quest. The problem I'm having, though, is I seem to have too many commands on my editing page. Like, the command list is too big to scroll through and I only know it's going to get worse as I continue to make the game. I was wondering if I could make folders to put commands in to separate them. Whenever I tried, however, the commands don't work in-game. Any solutions? And thanks.
Posts.HTML:

And thanks.

Posts.EditableText: Quest looks for commands in a specific place, so no, you cannot put them in folders (or objects). If a command is for a specific room, you can put it inside that room, and it will only work for that room (this is why folders will not work, by the way). I am wondering why you have so many. Are you aware that one command can match multiple input text? viewtopic.php?f=18&t=5862 You could look at using verbs instead. viewtopic.php?f=18&t=4953
